Icon (svg-icons set):

```js
const icons = ['rightArrow', 'downArrow'];

<div style={{ display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}>
  {icons.map((icon, i) => (
    <div
      key={i}
      style={{
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        alignItems: 'center',
        padding: '10px',
        fontSize: '14px'
      }}
    >
      <Icon icon={icon} />
      <div>{icon}</div>
    </div>
  ))}
</div>;
```
